actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.
Executive Comment Requested from OMB, ACIR, Justice.
Referred to Subcommittee on Intergovernmental Relations and Human Resources.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Intergovernmental Relations and Human Resources

official_title: A bill to make certain changes in the membership and operations of the Advisory Commission on Intergovernmental Relations.

summary.text: Increases from 26 to 30 the number of members of the Advisory Commission on Intergovernmental Relations, by adding: (1) one elected officer of a local government of an area with a population of less than 10,000 and one elected school board member, to be appointed by the President; and (2) one judge of a U.S. court of appeals or district court and one chief justice or judge of a State court of last resort, to be appointed by the Chief Justice of the United States.

titles.title: A bill to make certain changes in the membership and operations of the Advisory Commission on Intergovernmental Relations.
